dt-example.title: Bootstrap 3
dt-example.info: This example shows DataTables and the Buttons extension being used with the [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com) framework providing the styling. The [DataTables / Bootstrap integration](//datatables.net/manual/styling/bootstrap) provides seamless integration for DataTables to be used in a Bootstrap page.
